certifications.description: Participated in 24 hour National hackathon conducted by St.Joseph University
certifications.title: TECH QUEST

projects.name: Mental Health ChatBot
projects.description: Developed backend services for a mental health chatbot using Node.js, achieving 98% accuracy in understanding user intents and queries. Engineered a mental health support chatbot utilizing advanced NLP techniques, reducing user wait times by 40% and improving satisfaction rates by 25% through sentiment and intent analysis with spaCy and NLTK libraries.

projects.name: Farmers Fund Raising App using Blockchain
projects.description: Developed an innovative application to help farmers raise funds securely using blockchain technology during the St. Joseph University Hackathon. Implemented Python and Flask for backend development and ML algorithms for fraud detection. Received positive feedback from industry experts on its potential impact.

experiences.description: Completed key Salesforce Trailhead modules, including Organizational Setup, Types Of Flows & Security, and Lightning Web Components (LWC). Gained experience in Apex development, testing, and debugging, along with VS Code and CLI setup. Achieved Super Badge - Apex Specialist and Super Badge - Process Automation Specialist, demonstrating advanced skills in coding and automation.

Developed and maintained web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Python for backend, leading to a 30% increase in user engagement and a 25% improvement in data accuracy. Worked on the Soil Farming Agent project and Clinic Management System, implementing interactive user interfaces and backend services, which enhanced efficiency in data management and reduced administrative workload by 35%.
